narrative:
This prelicense inspection and exit interview was conducted with the owner by Curt McGruder-ACI and Katy
Vernon-ACI.
No noncompliant items identified this inspection.
Facility is to be licensed as a class "A" dealer.
Reviewed identification and record keeping requirements.
Reviewed presentation on program of vet care.
Facility is to submit the license fee to the regional office.
No covered activities may occur before receipt of the USDA license.
